name: rTraction
tagline: We use technology to improve community outcomes.
description:
rTraction Canada, Inc., is a Certified B Corporation and tech agency that is equal parts digital creative and custom development. As a B Corporation, we believe that doing well and doing good can co-exist. We use technology to improve community outcomes, working with social purpose organizations that do important work and need help building capacity or understanding technical complexity.

SEO, SEM, and Social Media Marketing

If you'd like to work with us, drop us a line to schedule a free consultation.
